cast.name: 伊西娅尔·伊图诺 Itziar Ituño
恩尼科·萨伽多伊 Eneko Sagardoy

awards:
第68届圣塞巴斯蒂安国际电影节(2020)
　　最佳新导演(提名) 伊曼努尔·拉约

director.name: 伊曼努尔·拉约 Imanol Rayo

introduction: A skeleton is found buried at the Garizmendi farmhouse. Fermín and Karmen call their son Néstor, who reports the matter to the authorities. But, when the agents turn up, the bones are gone. Suddenly, the bell on the nearby chapel begins to peal. This bad omen announces the coming of tragic events and reopens old wounds within the family, especially that of the death of Aitor, Néstor's twin brother. Now, as then, Karmen blames everything on her brother-in-law Estanis and tries to persuade Néstor that they will be next if they don't do something about it.
